item.title: The New Frontier for Drone Warfare Is Deep Underwater
item.description: New autonomous vessels, with evocative names like Ghost Shark and Manta Ray, are aimed at gathering intelligence and countering new threats at sea.

item.title: The Trouble With Searching Google for 'the Best'
item.description: Shopping sites tout five stars. No. 1 rankings. Media endorsements. But how do you know what’s real?

item.title: Apple Plans Thinner, Foldable iPhones to Revive Growth
item.description: The iPhone business, which accounts for around half of Apple’s overall revenue, is in a sales slump following years of mostly incremental upgrades to ...

item.title: There Are Mystery Drones Flying Over My House. I Tried to Track Them Down.
item.description: Authorities say unexplained aircraft over New Jersey is no cause for concern. My neighbors, however, are concerned.

item.title: Michael Dell Spent 40 Years Preparing for an AI Boom No One Expected
item.description: The man who founded Dell in a Texas dorm room has transformed his company. It’s not just about PCs anymore.
